com.redhat.rhn.frontend.events

Class NewCloneErrataEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.events.NewCloneErrataEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventDatabaseMessage, EventMessage

    public class NewCloneErrataEvent
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventDatabaseMessage
    NewCloneErrataAction - publish event to clone the errata into a channel. I wanted this to contain a list of errata ids and do multiple clones per event, but I couldn't get it to recall the list of ids once the message got popped back off
